page.title: 03SERVICES
page.content: Longborough village post office is also a general stores stocking all manner of provisions.It is open Mon., Tues.,Thurs.& Fri. all day & Wed. & Sat. mornings only.Postal collections are made twice a day Mon. to Fri. & once on Sat.Water supplies are managed by the Thames Water Authority.The villages are on mains sewage & there is a treatment plant on the eastern side of the village.There is no mains gas supply to the area & most houses rely on solid fuel,night storage or oil for heating.There is a dentist in Longborough.Milk deliveries from Elm Farm Dairies,Bourton are made three times a week.A mobile butcher calls weekly & refuge collections are on Tues.The mobile library stops in Longborough fortnightly on Wed.Both Stow & Moreton are responsible for policing.Two newspapers serve the area
